item.title: Fantastic Coffee and Where to Find Them
item.description: Background In short: I found a local shop which selling pretty good beans. In Hong Kong. During the 2020 pandamic, it’s not easy to buy beans overseas. However, it gave me a great opportunity to search for some good beans in Hong Kong. Plus, I have more time to stay at home and brew coffee as the company started the WFH policy from Feb. My Little Coffee üìç: Shop 102, Ho King Shopping Centre, Mong Kok, Kowloon, Hong Kong (map)
